short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plays a sound when new message comes in Twitch chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Features

- Support every chatroom on Twitch and YouTube
- Nice MSN "new message" sound
- Sound is customizable in the options page

## How-to

1. Install and make sure you've reload the page
2. Click the extension icon to toggle ON/OFF when you're on a page with Twitch chatroom
3. The extension will automatically toggle OFF when you navigate to other Twitch pages

## Changelog

## [1.3.1] - 2024-11-02
### Added
- Support for Twitch 2024/10 update

## [1.3.0] = 2024-05-26
### Added
- Support YouTube
- Add options page, which enables customization of sound file and volume

## [1.2.2] = 2020-05-16
### Added
- Support Twitch minor update at 2020 mid-May

## [1.2.1] = 2019-09-28
### Added
- Support Mixer site

## [1.2.0] - 2019-09-28
### Added
- Support new Twitch site (new logo version @ 2019)

## [1.1.0] - 2018-02-10
### Added
- Support new Twitch site (react version)

## [1.0.0] - 2018-08-25
- First release
